elevatorsimulation.event.elevator
Class ElevatorAI

java.lang.Object
  elevatorsimulation.event.Event
      elevatorsimulation.event.elevator.ElevatorAI

public class ElevatorAI
extends Event

This class is used to simulate the AI which drives the elevators, it updates the People waiting on the floors for elevators. This event is always present in the eventQueue. It enqueues one move for each elevator ( or allow people to enter / exit the elevator ) in the event queue. It increments waiting time of people at each level. It removes impatient people at each level.

Author:
vijay
